level.heading: DOME LIGHT INSTALLATION BUSINESS – NUMBERING SYSTEM OBLIGATIONS (§ 31-1523)

level.text: By installing a dome light, the dome light installation business certifies that at the time of such installation and testing it has:
Accepted and installed a dome light that meets the specifications of the commission found at § 605 of this title; and
Properly installed the dome light with the taxi vehicle number assigned to the taxi by the Commission.
